summary: Dominguez High, in the infamous Compton, CA, has not produced a play in over twenty years. With no money and no stage, two teachers and twenty-four students attempt to produce Thornton Wilder's American Classic OUR TOWN.
cast: Catherine Borek|Karen Greene|Ebony Starr Norwood-Brown|Archy Posada|Armia Robinson|Jackie Oliver|Christopher Patterson|Jose Perez
keywords: opening night|student|teacher|high school|amazing grace the hymn
title: OT: Our Town
